class Ability[source]

Ability(damage, damage_type)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class Character[source]

Character(name, max_health, ability)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class Mage[source]

Mage(name, max_health, ability) :: Character

This is the main class for the player

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
mage = Mage("Thierry", 100, Ability(10, "water"))
print(mage)

            Thierry's Current Health: 100
            Thierry's Max Health: 100
            Thierry's Ability Damage: 10
            Thierry's Ability Type: water
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class Demon[source]

Demon(name, max_health) :: Character

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
demon = Demon("Belzebut", 100)
print(demon)

            Belzebut's Current Health: 100
            Belzebut's Max Health: 100
            Belzebut's Ability Damage: 10
            Belzebut's Ability Type: fire
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

Mage.attack[source]

Mage.attack(target)

Attacks the given enemy

{% endraw %}

Let's see how to attack a Demon!

some bold text some Italic text {% include note.html content='this is a note which wil appear blue!' %}{% include warning.html content='this is a warning that will appear red!' %}

{% raw %} 
mage.attack(demon)
print(demon)

From Thierry's wand, ice-cold water is flung towards Belzebut.
            Belzebut's Current Health: 90
            Belzebut's Max Health: 100
            Belzebut's Ability Damage: 10
            Belzebut's Ability Type: fire
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
